actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide assistance to the George C. Wallace Community College in Hanceville, Alabama in the construction of a fitness training facility.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Education to provide financial assistance to the George C. Wallace Community College in Hanceville, Alabama, towards construction costs of a fitness training facility for sports, recreation, and fitness industry training. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide assistance to the George C. Wallace Community College in Hanceville, Alabama in the construction of a fitness training facility.
